name: Potion Ritual
description:
Game for the Global Game Jam 2016.

It's a game about a young witch learning how to make a magic potion. The ritual consists of taking the ingredients and mixing them together. In the end you have to discover the perfect combination of ingredients for the most spectacular of magic. Can you find all the recipes to summon the most curious creatures?

Programming: Tanya Romero, David Blaszyk

Art & Sound: Kai Op de Beeck
